short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Take care of your eyes day and night using dark theme for Help Scout tools and services.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Dark themes have officially become a thing. They help your eyes stay relaxed when you have to use your computer in a low light environment. And we have an excellent Dark Mode extension for your Help Scout! 

HELP SCOUT DARK MODE
Dark Mode works across all parts of Help Scout. You can easily toggle the dark mode on/off in a click, and adjust brightness and contrast in the interface as you wish. The adjustments are saved automatically, and you can reset them at any time. 

NIGHT SHIFT
Activate Night Shift mode to invert the blue light from the screen to a warmer tone, thus, preventing your eyes from harm. You can turn the tool on and off in a single click when you need it.
